content.question: Which of the following particle diagrams represents a process during which the entropy of the system increases?

choices.label: The figure presents a particle diagram of a process. The first box shows 6 neatly packed molecules, each represented by two connected white circles. The second box shows 6 scattered molecules.
The figure presents a particle diagram of a process. The first box shows 6 scattered atoms, each represented by a white circle. The second box shows 6 neatly packed atoms.

The figure presents a particle diagram of a reaction. The first box shows 4 scattered molecules, each represented by a dark circle connected to a white circle and 2 scattered molecules, each represented by two connected white circles. The second box shows 4 scattered molecules represented by a dark circle connected to two white circles.

The figure presents a particle diagram of a reaction. The first box shows 6 scattered molecules, each represented by a dark circle connected to two white circles. The second box shows 3 scattered molecules, each represented by two connected dark circles each connected to two white circles.

content.answer: The figure presents a particle diagram of a process. The first box shows 6 neatly packed molecules, each represented by two connected white circles. The second box shows 6 scattered molecules.

skill.text: 6.C: Support a claim with evidence from representations or models at the particulate level, such as the structure of atoms and/or molecules.
